credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Albert Bitzius - Jeremias Gotthelf
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description:
The background is a blurred, green-toned, originally black-and-white photograph of a man dressed by 19th century fashion. In lower right is the same photograph, rotated 180 degrees and toned orange. In upper right is a series of six black-and-white photographs, vertically arranged. 
Inscriptions: center, " JEREMIAS GOTTHELF / ALBERT BITZIUS "; lower right, " IM STRAUHOF ZURICH / IM STRAUHOF ZURICH "; long right edge of orange-toned photograph, " Offnungszeiten: Di, Mi, Fr 12-18 Uhr. Do 12-21 Uhr, Sa, So 11-18 Uhr, Mo geschlossen / Dauer der Ausstellung: 5 November 1997 bus 15. Februar 1998 / Im Strauhof Zurich, Augustinergasse, 9, 8001 Zurich ".
name: Poster
